author: bodewig
msg: Make not so strong, we don't really know whether we've managed to end
the spawned thread.  Make the thread a daemon thread.

author: conor
msg: Re-enable DependTest - no longer uses touch
Update many checks to handle optional tasks which require JDK 1.2+
Problems remain for builds with ORO present

author: bodewig
msg: refactor ExecuteWatchdog - extract a more generic timer.  Preparation
to allow timeout attribute in <java fork="false">
